name: Company Standard PCB Rules
description: Standard design rules for production PCBs - customize for your organization
author: Engineering Team

rules.name: Minimum Trace Width
rules.description: All traces must be at least 0.15mm wide for manufacturability

rules.name: Minimum Via Size
rules.description: Vias must meet minimum size requirements for manufacturing

rules.name: Minimum Via Spacing
rules.description: Vias must have adequate spacing for manufacturing

rules.name: Mounting Holes Grounded
rules.description: All mounting holes must be connected to ground for EMI shielding

rules.name: Assembly Fiducials
rules.description: Board must have at least 3 fiducials for automated assembly

rules.name: USB Reference Plane
rules.description: USB signals require a continuous reference plane for impedance control

rules.name: HDMI Reference Plane
rules.description: HDMI signals require a continuous reference plane

rules.name: 5V Power Trace Width
rules.description: 5V power traces must handle 2A with 10°C temperature rise

rules.name: 3.3V Power Trace Width
rules.description: 3.3V power traces must handle 1.5A with 10°C temperature rise

rules.name: USB Differential Pair Matching
rules.description: USB D+/D- must be length matched within 0.5mm

rules.name: Signal Trace Maximum Width
rules.description: Signal traces should not exceed 0.5mm to maintain impedance

rules.name: Decoupling Capacitor Required
rules.description: All ICs should have nearby decoupling capacitors
